Variable.Name: BusinessRuleHandlerNotMetError
Variable.Value: Business rules for handler 'handler_name' on action 'action_name' in task 'task_name' are not met.

Variable.Name: BusinessRuleHandlerNotMetDetailsError_NoProperty
Variable.Value: Business rules for handler 'handler_name' on action 'action_name' in task 'task_name' are not met. The task attachment object "object_name" contains invalid values for the following properties: property_name

Variable.Name: BusinessRuleHandlerNotMetDetailsError_CondNotSatisfy
Variable.Value: Object 'object_name' of type 'Object_type' doesn't satisfy the condition.

Variable.Name: AssignedProcessWarning
Variable.Value: The initial action was successful, but a subsequent task in the workflow has failed.

Variable.Name: AssignedProcessWarning_Details
Variable.Value: Action handler 'handler_name' on action 'action_name' in task 'task_name' recorded the following 1 entries.

Variable.Name: Incorrectpwd_SecuredTask
Variable.Value: An incorrect password is provided for the secure task.

Variable.Name: TargetObjectError
Variable.Value: Target object, 'ObjectName' should have 'ObjectType' in 'Relation1' attachments 'Relation2'.

Variable.Name: Release_Invalid_Status
Variable.Value: Business rules for handler 'handler_name' on action 'action_name' in task 'task_name' are not met. The release status of the target "ObjectName" is invalid.

Variable.Name: TargetObjectError01
Variable.Value: Business rules for handler 'handler_name' on action 'action_name' in task 'task_name' are not met. Target object, 'ObjectName' should have 'ObjectType' with no release status in 'Relation' attachments.

Variable.Name: TargetObjectError02
Variable.Value: Business rules for handler 'handler_name' on action 'action_name' in task 'task_name' are not met. Target object, 'ObjectName' should have 'ObjectType' with any of 'Process_Status' statuses, in 'Relation' attachments.

Variable.Name: UnableToOpen
Variable.Value: The selected object is neither a Workflow Process nor a Task. It does not have an associated Workflow Process either. Hence it cannot be opened in Workflow Viewer.

Variable.Name: InitalActionWarning
Variable.Value: The initial action was successful, but a subsequent task in the workflow may have failed.

Variable.Name: BusinessRuleHandlerNotMetDetailsError_Progression
Variable.Value: One or more components are at lower level than the assembly status, 'ASM_STATUS'

Variable.Name: NotAnAuthorizedUser
Variable.Value: You are not an authorized user.

Variable.Name: InitalActionWarning@2
Variable.Value: The initial action was successful, but a subsequent task in the workflow has failed. Action handler 'handler_name' on action 'action_name' in task 'task_name' recorded the following 1 entries. No attachment of the specified type can be found.

Variable.Name: ErrRefreshFolder
Variable.Value: The action cannot be executed because the task folder is out of date. Please refresh your "FolderName" folders and reconsider your action.

Variable.Name: ErrInvalidArguments
Variable.Value: The initial action was successful, but a subsequent task in the workflow has failed. Action handler 'handler_name' on action 'action_name' in task 'task_name' recorded the following 1 entries. Invalid Arguments Supplied - Please specify 'source_task' only when '-source=task' is specified.

Variable.Name: ErrInvalidUser
Variable.Value: The initial action was successful, but a subsequent task in the workflow has failed. Action handler 'handler_name' on action 'action_name' in task 'task_name' recorded the following 1 entries. The assignee argument value "argument_value" could not be resolved either as a "GroupMember", or as a "ResourcePool".

Variable.Name: ErrSourceTask
Variable.Value: The initial action was successful, but a subsequent task in the workflow has failed. Action handler 'handler_name' on action 'action_name' in task 'task_name' recorded the following 1 entries. A source Task "source_task" has not been properly specified.

Variable.Name: ErrNoTask
Variable.Value: The initial action was successful, but a subsequent task in the workflow has failed. Action handler 'handler_name' on action 'action_name' in task 'task_name' recorded the following 1 entries. The required arguments are missing for the handler.

Variable.Name: ErrAbortTask
Variable.Value: The action cannot be executed because the task folder is out of date. Please refresh your "My Worklist" folders and reconsider your action.

Variable.Name: ErrNumberOfReviewersAssigned
Variable.Value: Business rules for handler 'handler_name' on action 'action_name' in task 'task_name' are not met. The number of reviewers assigned to the task "task_name" must be at least Number_reviewers.

Variable.Name: TaskResultToValidValue
Variable.Value: The task result must be set to a valid value before performing the "action_name" action.

Variable.Name: Release_Invalid_Status_Analyst
Variable.Value: Business rules for handler 'handler_name' on action 'action_name' in task 'task_name' are not met.@One of the following must apply to the current user in order to complete the action: a member of role_name.

Variable.Name: InterprocessTaskDependenciesError
Variable.Value: Interprocess Task Dependencies not met for task 'process_name'.

Variable.Name: ChangeUserSettingError2
Variable.Value: Your current group/role, "group_name1/role_name1", does not match the required group/role, "group_name2/role_name2". Do you want to change your current user setting to "group_name3/role_name3"?

Variable.Name: AttachmentsPanelCutError
Variable.Value: Property Targets is not modifiable.

Variable.Name: BusinessRuleHandlerNotMetError_ForChecked_out_ErrorMsg
Variable.Value: Business rules for handler 'handler_name' on action 'action_name' in task 'task_name' are not met. "rev_name" is checked-out by "user".

Variable.Name: ErrorMsgOnActionPerform
Variable.Value: The action "Complete", which has been triggered by the task "task_name", is not applicable because its current state is "Completed".

Variable.Name: DrawingRevisionErrMsg
Variable.Value: Business rules for handler 'EPM-validate-target-objects' on action 'Start' in task 'EPM-validate-target-objects_DisallowMultiType' are not met. Target object type 'DocumentRevision' is invalid. The handler arguments are as follows: '-include_type=ItemRevision-exclude_type=DocumentRevision,DrawingRevision'

Variable.Name: SignoffDoTaskErrMsg
Variable.Value: The initial action was successful, but a subsequent task in the workflow has failed. Business rules for handler 'EPM-validate-target-objects' on action 'Complete' in task 'New Add Status Task 1' are not met. Target object type 'Drawing Revision' is invalid. The handler arguments are as follows: '-include_type=ItemRevision-exclude_type=Drawing Revision'

Variable.Name: NonExistingWarningMsg
Variable.Value: The initial action was successful, but a subsequent task in the workflow has failed. Action handler 'handler_name' on action 'action_name' in task 'task_name' recorded the following 1 entries. Unable to find a property with name ItemRevision/non_existing.

Variable.Name: ItemRevisionErrMsg
Variable.Value: Business rules for handler 'handler_name' on action 'action_name' in task 'task_name' are not met. Target object revision 'obj_rev' is invalid. The handler arguments are as follows: 'arg_value'

Variable.Name: SignoffsErrorMsg
Variable.Value: Action handler 'handler_name' on action 'action_name' in task 'task_name' recorded the following 1 entries. Signoff comments required for this 'decision_name' decision.

Variable.Name: BusinessRuleHandlerCheckedout_WarningMsg
Variable.Value: The initial action was successful, but a subsequent task in the workflow has failed. Business rules for handler 'handler_name' on action 'action_name' in task 'task_name' are not met. "rev_name" is checked-out by "user".

Variable.Name: BusinessRuleHandlerCheckedout_ErrorMsg
Variable.Value: Business rules for handler 'handler_name' on action 'action_name' in task 'task_name' are not met. "rev_name" is checked-out by "user".

Variable.Name: Checkedout_ErrorMsg
Variable.Value: "rev_name" is checked-out by "user".

Variable.Name: IncorrectPwdForSecuredTask
Variable.Value: Incorrect password entered for secured task. Please enter the correct password.

Variable.Name: ChangeUserSettingError3
Variable.Value: Your current group/role does not match the required group/role 'group_name/role_name'. Would you like to change your current user setting to 'group_name/role_name'?

Variable.Name: BusinessRuleHandlerNotMetError@1
Variable.Value: The Reviewer "@UserName" does not have "Read" access to the target attachments.
